Dice¶

class Dice¶

Utility class for random number generation.

Uses the Mersenne Twister engine for high-quality random numbers.

Public Static Functions

static void init()¶

Initializes the random number generator.

Should be called once at the beginning of the program.

static int get(int min, int max)¶

Generates a random integer within a specified range.

パラメータ:

  • min -- The minimum value (inclusive).

  • max -- The maximum value (inclusive).

戻り値:

A random integer between min and max.

Private Static Attributes

static std::mt19937 mt¶

Mersenne Twister random number generator.

Source Code

Header (include/utils/Dice.h):

 1#ifndef DICE_H
 2#define DICE_H
 3
 4#include <random>
 5
 6/**
 7 * @brief Utility class for random number generation.
 8 *
 9 * Uses the Mersenne Twister engine for high-quality random numbers.
10 */
11class Dice {
12public:
13    /**
14     * @brief Initializes the random number generator.
15     *
16     * Should be called once at the beginning of the program.
17     */
18    static void init();
19
20    /**
21     * @brief Generates a random integer within a specified range.
22     *
23     * @param min The minimum value (inclusive).
24     * @param max The maximum value (inclusive).
25     * @return A random integer between min and max.
26     */
27    static int get(int min, int max);
28
29private:
30    static std::mt19937 mt; ///< Mersenne Twister random number generator.
31};
32
33#endif // DICE_H

Implementation (src/utils/Dice.cpp):

 1#include "utils/Dice.h"
 2#include <ctime>
 3
 4std::mt19937 Dice::mt;
 5
 6void Dice::init() {
 7    std::random_device rd;
 8    mt.seed(rd());
 9}
10
11int Dice::get(int min, int max) {
12    std::uniform_int_distribution<int> dist(min, max);
13    return dist(mt);
14}
